data.name: Rattler II
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle. A cheap offensive option, but has to be reloaded 2 bullets at a time.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Rattler III
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle. A cheap offensive option, but has to be reloaded 2 bullets at a time.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Rattler IV
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle. A cheap offensive option, but has to be reloaded 2 bullets at a time.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Recorder
data.description: A playable recorder used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

data.name: Red Coral Jewelry
data.description: Valued for its fine craftmanship, and effortless ability to make your eyes pop.

data.name: Red Light Stick
data.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

data.name: Red Light Stick Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Red Light Stick.

data.name: Reinforced Reception Security Code
data.description: Temporary security code to unlock the main gate.
data.flavor_text: Can only be used during Locked Gate

data.name: Remote Control
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Remote Raider Flare
data.description: A deployable device that, when manually triggered, launches a Raider Distress Flare.

data.name: Remote Raider Flare Blueprint
data.description: Allows you to craft the Remote Raider Flare.

data.name: Renegade I
data.description: Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Renegade II
data.description: Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.description: Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.description: Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Resin
data.description: Can be used to gradually restore a small amount of health over time.

data.name: Ripped Safety Vest
data.description: A remnant of a time long lost, when it was fashionable to stand out.

data.name: Rocketeer Driver
data.description: A salvaged component from a Rocketeer unit.

data.name: Rocket Thruster
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Rope
data.description: Used in crafting.

data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Rotary Encoder
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Rubber Duck
data.description: Always there to lend an ear, should you need it.

data.name: Rubber Pad
data.description: Can be recycled into rubber parts.

data.name: Rubber Parts
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: An augment ruined beyond repair

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Some rusted old bolts

data.name: Rusted Gear
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Rusted Shut Medical Kit
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting material.

data.name: Rusted Tools
data.description: Can be recycled into metal parts.

data.name: Rusty ARC Steel
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies and activities. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: Sample Cleaner
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Seeker Grenade
data.description: A homing grenade that targets a single nearby ARC dealing explosive damage on impact

data.name: Seeker Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Seeker Grenade

data.name: Sensors
data.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

data.name: Sentinel Firing Core
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Shaker
data.description: A rhythmic instrument used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

data.name: Shield Recharger
data.description: A handheld repair kit that recharges a shield on use.

data.name: Shotgun ammo
data.description: Shotgun shells used for shotguns.

data.name: Shotgun Choke I
data.description: Slightly reduces base dispersion.

data.name: Shotgun Choke II
data.description: Moderately reduces base dispersion.

data.name: Shotgun Choke II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Shotgun Choke II

data.name: Shotgun Choke III
data.description: Significantly reduces base dispersion. Compatible with: II Toro, Vulcano
